column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I took my main squeeze here for Valentine's Day. I booked several weeks in advance
column2: but the best I could get through Open Table was a 9:30 reservation. I called a few days later
column3: asking if maybe they had something earlier. I was told no
column4: but that they would "make a note" that I'd like something earlier. I shrugged that off
column5: but got a call a few weeks later informing me that an 8:45 was available. That
column7: led me to believe I was in for a great experience. (Full disclosure: we showed up 20 minutes late. Oh
